byline.original: By NICK WINGFIELD and CECILIA KANG

abstract: United States Court of Appeals for Second Circuit overturns lower court ruling that Microsoft must surrender email for suspect in narcotics probe that are stored in Microsoft data center in Dublin; surprise ruling has potential privacy ramifications for cloud computing business.
lead_paragraph: The United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit reversed a ruling that Microsoft must turn over email stored in a data center in Dublin.

headline.main: Microsoft Wins Appeal on Overseas Data Searches
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Wins Appeal on Overseas Data Search

snippet: The United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit reversed a ruling that Microsoft must turn over email stored in a data center in Dublin....
